name: Accumulatorenwerke HOPPECKE Carl Zoellner & Sohn GmbH
goal:
Hoppecke is a manufacturer of industrial batteries with production sites in Germany, China and 12 other assembly facilities worldwide.
We plan, develop, produce, manufacture, install and service industrial electrochemical energy storage solutions for all industrial applications based on lead, nickel, lithium and other technologies
Hoppecke is active in the field of trak (warehouse and other traction applications), grid storage (backup power), sun (offgrid-applications) and rail (auxillary and traction applications).
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
